title: Callblock
description: Callblock is the first app that lets you stop telemarketing phone calls in iOS (techcrunch.com/2016/09/07/callblocks-new-ios-app-will-block-calls-from-over-2-million-telemarketers/), with the world’s biggest directory of telemarketers – now over 3,000,000 classified entries from over 100 countries!
